backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing quotes mapped by author, allowing adding quotes, fetching by author, and returning all quotes sorted by author.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report listing implemented frontend files, components, and associated requirements with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten file summaries for various frontend components, hooks, pages, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme defining warm OKLCH color variables, light/dark modes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with header, footer, and a paper-texture background that renders the QuotesHome page.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying attribution and styled with a blurred background and border.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header showing site logo, title, and subtitle with a blurred background.
frontend/src/components/quotes/QuoteCard: Card component showing a single quote with icon, text, and author attribution.
frontend/src/components/quotes/QuoteFeed: Quote list component handling loading, error, empty states, and rendering QuoteCards.
frontend/src/components/quotes/QuotesToo: Search and sort toolbar with text input and dropdown selector for organizing quotes.
frontend/src/components/quotes/QuoteSubm: Expandable form allowing users to submit quotes with validation, loading states, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing the backend actor based on user identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuotes.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch sorted quotes from the backend and submit new quotes, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and a warm light/dark color theme with custom fonts and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/QuotesHome.tsx: Implements the main quotes page with filtering, sorting, submission form, and a feed of quotes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
